anya-e0807n5:2_1: Kāla+kāraka+purisaparidīpakaṁ kriyālakkhaṇaṁ tyādyantaṁ aliṅgañca, vuttampi ce+taṁ –
anya-e0807n5:6_1: Kriyā attho etassāti kriyattho dhātu, so ca duvidho sakammakā+kammakavasena.
anya-e0807n5:6_2: Tattha yasmiṁ kriyatthe kattuvācimhā kammaṁ gavesīyate, so sakammako. Itaro akammako.
anya-e0807n5:7_0: Tatra sakammakā kammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā kaṭaṁ karoti, gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacati.
anya-e0807n5:7_1: Akammakā kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā acchati seti tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0807n5:7_2: Kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattari kamme vā patiṭṭhito kārakasamūhasādhiyo padattho vuccati. Api ca –
anya-e0807n5:10_0: Kara+bhūdhātūhi karaṇañca bhavanañca vuccati, pāka+gamanādīhi tesaṁ kriyābhavanānaṁ vāccattaṁ kathaṁ bhavatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Punapi –
anya-e0807n5:14_0: Kāriyarūpā hi dhātvatthā, sattāyuttā ca te+khilā;
anya-e0807n5:15_0: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṁ tesu gamyate.
anya-e0807n5:16_1: Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0807n5:17_0: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:19_0: Ekānekesu tumhaamhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṁ paracchakkānañca majjhimu+ttama+paṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:19_2: Si tha iti majjhimapuriso, majjhe niddiṭṭhattā. Mi ma iti uttamapuriso.
anya-e0807n5:19_5: Evaṁ sesesu bhavissatiādīsu sattasu paccayavidhānasuttesupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:20_0: Idāni bhūvādīna+maṭṭhagaṇānaṁ bhūvādigaṇesu bhū=sattāya+miti paṭhamadhātuto parā tyādayo yojīyante.
anya-e0807n5:20_1: Tattha ‘‘ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṁ’’ti tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattu+kamma+bhāvesuyeva kyavikaraṇalavikaraṇā hontīti ‘‘kyo bhāvakammesva+parokkhesu māna+nta+tyādīsu’’ ‘‘kattari lo’’ iccādinā tesaṁ vikaraṇānaṁ vidhānā tyādayo kattu+kamma+bhāvesveva viññāyantīti kattari timhilo. Ke te vikaraṇā –
anya-e0807n5:22_0: Nissāya paccayā honti, ete vikaraṇā siyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:24_0: Ivaṇṇu+vaṇṇantānaṁ kriyattānaṁ e+o honti yathākkamaṁ paccayeti ūsso+kāro.
anya-e0807n5:26_0: Sare pare eona+mayavā honti yathākkamaṁti ossa avādeso.
anya-e0807n5:26_1: So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā itthī sādhu bhavati, cittaṁ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0807n5:27_0: Uttattā kattu ākhyāte, tatiyā na ca kattari;
anya-e0807n5:29_0: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṁ bahuttā ‘‘bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṁ’’ti anti.
anya-e0807n5:31_0: Vikaraṇānaṁ kvaci lopo hotīti lavikaraṇassa lopo, sesaṁ purimasadisaṁ. Te purisā bhavanti.
anya-e0807n5:33_0: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Ahaṁ bhavāmi.
anya-e0807n5:33_2: Evaṁ paracchekkepi-bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase, bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0807n5:33_3: Keci dīghaṁ katvā paṭhanti, ‘‘byañjane dīgharassā’’ti dīgho, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:40_1: Paca iti ṭhite lavikaraṇaṁ, vikaraṇalopādi purimasamaṁ. So odanaṁ pacati, te pacanti. Tvaṁ pacasi, tumhe pacatha. Ahaṁ pacāmi, mayaṁ pacāma. Paracchakke-pacate, pacante. Pacase, pacavhe. Pace, pacāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:42_1: Paṭhamamajjhimapurisānaṁ dvinnaṁ ekattha pasaṅge majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṁ thapaccayo.
anya-e0807n5:42_2: So ca pacati, tvañca pacasi, tumhe pacatha.
anya-e0807n5:42_3: Tulyabalavirodhino hi vippaṭisedhā paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ ekattha pasaṅge uttamapurisabahuvacanaṁ hoti, so ca pacati, tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi mayaṁ pacāmāti bhavati.
anya-e0807n5:45_0: Etesaṁ dhātūnaṁ cchaṅa vā hoti nta+māna+tyādīsu. So gāmaṁ gacchati. Anti –
anya-e0807n5:47_0: Garupubbasmā rassā nte+ntīnaṁ re vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:52_3: Cchādesābhāvapakkhe ‘‘ū lasse’’ti ekāre gameti. Paralope gamenti. Gamesi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0807n5:52_4: Paracchakkepi so gacchate, gacchare gacchante. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:53_0: Pure adhammo dibbati, purā marāmīti ca taṁsamīpe tabbohārūpacārena vattamānavacanaṁ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n5:61_0: Pure+purāsaddehi vā anāgatatā gamyate, tadā tassa vattamānattā.
anya-e0807n5:61_1: Kālabyattayo vā eso, bhavantyeva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā ‘‘santesu parigūhāmi’’ ‘‘kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṁ, sahabyataṁ gacchati vāsavassa’’ ‘‘ativelaṁ namassissaṁ’’ti.
anya-e0807n5:61_2: ‘‘Kuto nu tvaṁ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī’’tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:62_0: 5,175. Gama vada dānaṁ ghamma vajja dajjā
anya-e0807n5:63_0: Gamādīnaṁ ghammādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:67_0: Vuttattā akammakato kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:69_0: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu māna+nta+tyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā. Kakāro+nubandhakāriyattho.
anya-e0807n5:71_0: Ākhyātena avuttattā, kattuto tatiyā na tu;
anya-e0807n5:73_0: Anubhūyanti sampattiyo tayā. Anubhūyasi tvaṁ devadattena. Anubhūyatha tumhe.
anya-e0807n5:73_1: Ahaṁ anubhūyāmi, tayā mayaṁ anubhūyāma. Dvitte anubhuyyati+ccādi. Evaṁ paracchakke.
anya-e0807n5:77_0: Kriyatthā kyassa īña vā hoti. Ño ādyāvayavattho.
anya-e0807n5:77_1: Devadattena odano pacīyati paccati, reādese odanā pacīyare pacīyanti, paccare paccanti. Cavaggapubbarūpāni.
anya-e0807n5:77_2: Tvaṁ pacīyasi paccasi, tumhe pacīyatha paccatha.
anya-e0807n5:77_3: Ahaṁ pacīyāmi paccāmi, mayaṁ pacīyāma paccāma.
anya-e0807n5:78_0: Gamito kamme cchaṅa ca īñaāgame ca kate tena gāmo gacchīyati, gāmā gacchīyanti. Gacchīyasi, gacchīyatha. Gacchīyāmi, gacchīyāma. Evaṁ paracchakke.
anya-e0807n5:78_2: Gamīyasi gammasi, gamīyatha gammatha, gamīyāmi gammāmi, gamīyāma gammāma paracchakkepi evaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:81_0: Tathā hi vijjamānassāpi kammāssa avacanicchāyaṁ idaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0807n5:82_0: Satopi na vivakkhā+ssa, asatopi ca sā bhave;
anya-e0807n5:87_1: Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssati ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṁ ssāmhe
anya-e0807n5:88_0: Bhavissati=anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:90_0: Kriyatthā paresaṁ aādīnaṁ īādīnaṁ ssādīnañca byañjanassi+ña hoti vibhāsā. Vavatthitavibhāsā+yaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:90_1: Sseti ssādīnaṁ ssatiādīnañcāvayavo gahito, ‘‘ūbyañjanassā’’ti siddhepi tyādīsu etesamevāti niyamattho+ya+mārambho.
anya-e0807n5:90_2: Lassākāralope o+avādese bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi, bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate, bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe. Bhavissaṁ, bhavissāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:93_3: Aññatra anubhūyissati, anubhūyissanti iccādi. Evaṁ paracchakke. Bhāve-bhūyissati bhūyissate.
anya-e0807n5:94_2: Paccissanti odanā pacīyissanti, pacīyissare, paccissare, paccissanti.
anya-e0807n5:95_2: Ahaṁ gacchissāmi, mayaṁ gacchissāma. Gacchissate, gacchissante. Gacchissase, gacchissavhe. Gacchissaṁ, gacchissāmhe. Saggaṁ gamissati, gamissanti. Gamissasi, gamissatha. Gamissāmi, gamissāma iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:95_5: Tathā ghammissati ghammīyissati, ghammissanti, ghammīyissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:97_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṁ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:97_3: Na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā bhavissati.
anya-e0807n5:97_4: Kathañhi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṁ kuṭikaṁ karissati.
anya-e0807n5:97_5: Vimhaye-acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti, yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva dakkhiti, na pana saddaṁ sossati.
anya-e0807n5:97_6: Acchariyaṁ andho nāma pabbata+mārohissati, badhiro nāma saddaṁ sossati. (Bhavissantipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:98_0: 4. Bhūte ī uṁ o ttha iṁ mhā ā ū se vhaṁ a mhe
anya-e0807n5:99_0: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā īādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:99_1: Bhūtānajjatane upari vakkhamānattā ime īādayo bhūtajjatane.
anya-e0807n5:105_0: Āādo īādo ssādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hotīti dhātuto pubbaṁ aña.
anya-e0807n5:107_0: Eyyāthādīnaṁ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṁti īssattho, abhavittho, bhavittho, abhavattho, bhavattho.
anya-e0807n5:107_1: ‘‘Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā’’ti īssa rassattaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:109_1: Abhaviṁsu bhaviṁsu, abhavaṁsu bhavaṁsu, abhavuṁ bhavuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:111_1: Abhava bhava, abhavi bhavi, iñāgame abhavittha bhavittha, abhavattha bhavattha, abhavittho bhavittho, abhavattho bhavattho.
anya-e0807n5:113_1: Abhavisi bhavisi, abhavasi bhavasi. Abhavo bhavo.
anya-e0807n5:115_0: Esaṁ uña vā hoti. Īādisambandhīnameva gahaṇaṁ. Abhavuttha bhavuttha.
anya-e0807n5:117_0: Iṁssa ca siña vā hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:117_2: Abhavasittha bhavasittha, abhavittha bhavittha, abhavattha bhavattha, abhavisiṁ bhavisiṁ, abhavasiṁ bhavasiṁ, abhaviṁ bhaviṁ. Uñāgame āssa rasso.
anya-e0807n5:117_4: Siñāgame abhavasimha bhavasimha abhavasimhā bhavasimhā abhavimha bhavimha abhavimhā bhavimhā abhavamha bhavamha abhavamhā bhavamhā.
anya-e0807n5:117_5: Paracchakke – ‘‘eyyāthā’’dinā tthe abhavittha bhavittha abhavattha bhavattha.
anya-e0807n5:117_6: Rasse abhavatha bhavatha, abhavā bhavā, abhavu bhavu.
anya-e0807n5:117_7: Abhavise bhavise, abhavase bhavase, abhavivhaṁ bhavivhaṁ abhavavhaṁ bhavavhaṁ, assa a+mādese abhavaṁ bhavaṁ abhava bhava, abhavimhe bhavimhe abhavamhe bhavamhe.
anya-e0807n5:117_8: Kamme sukhaṁ tayā anubhūyittho anvabhūyattho anubhūyattho anvabhūsi anubhūsī anvabhūyī anubhūyī, anvabhūyiṁsu anubhūyiṁsu anvabhūyaṁsu anubhūyaṁsu anvabhūyuṁ anubhūyuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:117_9: Bhāve-tena abhūyittho bhūyittho abhūyattho bhūyattho abhūyi bhūyi abhūyī bhūyī.
anya-e0807n5:117_10: Tena abhūyattha bhūyattha abhūya bhūya abhūyā bhūyā.
anya-e0807n5:118_2: Cavaggapubba- rūpe apaccittho paccittho apaccattho paccattho apacīyi pacīyi apacīyī pacīyī apacci pacci apaccī paccī, apacīyiṁsu pacīyiṁsu apaciṁsu paciṁsu apacīyaṁsu pacīyaṁsu apaccaṁsu paccaṁsu apacīyuṁ pacīyuṁ apaccuṁ paccuṁ iccādi kattusamaṁ, pubbarūpova viseso.
anya-e0807n5:119_0: So gāmaṁ agacchittho gacchittho iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:121_0: Ḍaṁsassa ca gamissa ca ñchaṅa vā hoti ā+īādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:121_1: Agañchittho gañchittho agañchattho gañchattho agañchi gañchi agañchī gañchī iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:123_0: Āādo īādo ca gamissa ā hoti vā.
anya-e0807n5:123_1: So agā agami gami agamittho gamittho agamattho gamattho.
anya-e0807n5:123_2: Īpaccaye lassākārassa ‘‘himimesva+ssā’’ti ettha ‘‘assā’’ti yogavibhāgā dīghe ‘‘dīghā īssā’’ti īssa siādeso, agamāsi agami gami agamī gamī, agamiṁsu gamiṁsu agamaṁsu gamaṁsu agamuṁ gamuṁ. Ossa aādese ajjhaguṁ. Tvaṁ ajjhagā parassa lopo. Tumhe ajjhaguttha.
anya-e0807n5:123_4: Paracchakke – ‘‘eyyāthā’’dinā tthe so agacchittha gacchittha agañchittha gañchittha agamittha gamittha agama gama agamā gamā.
anya-e0807n5:123_5: Te agamū gamū, ossa āādese ajjhaguṁ. Tvaṁ agamise gamise. Tumhe agamivhaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:123_6: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’ dinā a+mādese ahaṁ agamaṁ gamaṁ ajjhagaṁ. Mayaṁ agamimhe gamimhe.
anya-e0807n5:123_7: Kammeagacchīyi agamīyi, agacchiyuṁ agamiyuṁ iccādi. Tathā aghammī ghammī iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:125_0: Māyoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti.
anya-e0807n5:125_1: Sakakālato kālantarepi paccayavidhānattho+yaṁ. Mā bhavaṁ abhavittho iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:125_2: Vāvidhānāssatyādi+eyyādi+tvādayopi honti, mā bhavaṁ bhavissati, mā bhavaṁ bhaveyya, mā bhavaṁ bhavatu iccādi. (Īādipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:126_1: Anajjatane ā ūo ttha a mhā ttha tthuṁ se vhaṁ iṁ mhase
anya-e0807n5:127_0: Avijjamānajjatane bhūtatthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti vā.
anya-e0807n5:127_1: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā tthe ‘‘ā ī ū mhā’’ iccādinā rasse ca so abhavattha bhavattha abhava bhava abhavā bhavā, te abhavu bhavu abhavū bhavū.
anya-e0807n5:127_2: O, ‘‘ossā’’tiādinā aādayo, abhava bhava abhavi bhavi abhavattha bhavattha abhavattho bhavattho, siādese abhavasi bhavasi abhavo bhavo. Tumhe abhavattha bhavattha.
anya-e0807n5:127_3: Ahaṁ abhavaṁ bhavaṁ abhava bhava, mayaṁ abhavamha bhavamha abhavamhā bhavamhā. So abhavattha bhavattha. Te abhavatthuṁ bhavatthuṁ. Tvaṁ abhavase bhavase. Tumhe abhavavhaṁ bhavavhaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:127_4: ‘‘Issa ca siña’’ti siṁ, ahaṁ abhavasiṁ bhavasiṁ abhaviṁ bhaviṁ. Mayaṁ abhavamhase bhavamhase.
anya-e0807n5:127_5: Kamme-tthe sukhaṁ tayā anubhūyittha, iñāgamābhāve anubhūyattha iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:128_0: So odanaṁ apacattha pacattha iccādi kattusamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:128_1: Kamme-apacīyattha pacīyattha apaccattha paccattha apacīya pacīya apacīyā pacīyā apacca pacca apaccā paccā.
anya-e0807n5:128_2: Apacīyu pacīyu apacīyū pacīyū apaccu paccu apaccū paccū iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:128_3: ‘‘Māyoge ī+āādī’’ti māyogepi āādayo, mā bhavaṁ apaccattha iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:129_1: Tathā agamattha gamattha iccādipi aghammattha ghammattha iccādipi. (Anajjatanapaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:130_1: Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe
anya-e0807n5:131_0: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane vattamānato kriyatthā aādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:133_1: ‘‘Bhūssa vuka’’ itiādīsu vuka, bhūva bhūva iti dvitte –
anya-e0807n5:135_0: Dvitte pubbassa ādito+ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:137_0: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti.
anya-e0807n5:139_0: Dvitte pubbesaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathākkamaṁti bakāre so babhūva kira, te babhuvu kira.
anya-e0807n5:139_1: Tvaṁ babhuve kira, iña tumhe babhuvittha kira.
anya-e0807n5:139_2: Ahaṁ babhuva kira, mayaṁ babhuvimha kira.
anya-e0807n5:139_3: So babhuvittha kira, te babhuvire kira.
anya-e0807n5:139_4: Tvaṁ babhuvittho kira, tumhe babhuvivho kira.
anya-e0807n5:139_5: Ahaṁ babhuvi kira, mayaṁ babhuvimhe kira. Kamme-anupabhuva kira iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:140_1: Aññatra ‘‘saṁyogādilopo’’ti lopo, papacittha. Papaca, papacimha. Papacittha, papacire.
anya-e0807n5:140_2: Papacittho papacitho, papacivho. Papaci, papacimhe. Evaṁ kamme.
anya-e0807n5:141_0: Aādipaccaye dvibhāve anādibyañjanalope pubbassa ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’’ti cavaggajakāre ‘‘byañjane dīgharassā’’ti dīghe ca kate so gāmaṁ jagāma kira, jagamu. Jagame, jagamittha. Jagama, jagamimha. Jagamittha, jagamire. Jagamittho, jagamivho. Jagami, jagamimhe. Evaṁ kamme.
anya-e0807n5:142_0: Mūḷhavikkhittabyāsattacittena attanāpi kriyā katā abhinibbattikāle+nupaladdhāsamānā phalenā+numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto.
anya-e0807n5:143_1: Yyodo vā+tipattiyaṁ ssā ssaṁsu sse ssatha ssaṁ ssamhā ssatha ssiṁsussasessavhessiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0807n5:144_2: Ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyā atītānāgatesveva honti, na vattamāne, tatra kriyātipatyasambhavā.
anya-e0807n5:144_3: Iñāgame ssāssa vā rasse ca sace so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṁ alabhissa, arahā abhavissa bhavissa abhavissā bhavissā vā, te ca taṁ alabhissaṁsu, arahanto abhavissaṁsu bhavissaṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:144_4: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’dinā ssessa vā akāre tvaṁ abhavissa bhavisse. Tumhe abhavissatha. Ahaṁ abhavissaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:144_5: Rasse mayaṁ abhavissamha bhavissamha abhavissamhā bhavissamhā.
anya-e0807n5:144_6: Paracchakke-so abhavissatha, abhavissiṁsu. Abhavissase, abhavissavhe. Abhavissiṁ, abhavissāmhase.
anya-e0807n5:145_2: Bhāve-tena abhūyissa bhūyissa abhūyissā bhūyissā. Abhūyissatha bhūyissatha.
anya-e0807n5:146_0: Evaṁ taṇḍulādisādhanaṁ alabhissa, odanaṁ apacissa pacissa iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:146_1: Kamme-tena odano apacissa pacissa apacissā pacissā apacīyissa pacīyissa apacīyissā pacīyissā apaccissa paccissa apaccissā paccissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:147_0: So agacchissa gacchissa agacchissā gacchissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:147_1: Cchādesā+bhāve agamissa gamissa agamissā gamissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:147_3: Agamissa gamissa agamīyissa iccādi. Tathā aghammissa iccādi. (Kriyātipattipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n5:148_1: Hetuphalesve+yya eyyuṁ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṁ etho eyyāvho eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:149_0: Hetubhūtāyaṁ phalabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṁ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā.
anya-e0807n5:151_1: So dāni kinnu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya.
anya-e0807n5:153_1: Sace saṁkhārā niccā bhavuṁ bhaveyyuṁ, na nirujjheyyuṁ. Yadi tvaṁ bhave bhaveyyāsi.
anya-e0807n5:153_2: ‘‘Eyyāthā’’ dinā assa okāre tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha katha+mahaṁ devo bhaveyyāmi.
anya-e0807n5:155_0: Eyyāmassa emu vā hoti u ca.
anya-e0807n5:155_1: Kinnu kho mayaṁ bhavemu bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0807n5:155_2: Paracchakke-bhavetha, bhaveraṁ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho. Bhave bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe.
anya-e0807n5:155_3: Kamme-sukhaṁ tayā anubhuyye anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyuṁ anubhūyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:155_4: Tena tvaṁ anubhūye anubhūyeyyāsi, tumhe anubhūyeyyātho anubhūyeyyātha.
anya-e0807n5:155_5: Tenā+haṁ anubhūyeyyāmi, mayaṁ anubhūyemu anubhūyeyyāmu anubhūyeyyāma.
anya-e0807n5:157_0: Anumatiyaṁ-so gāmaṁ gacche gaccheyya iccādi. Aññatra game gameyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:158_0: Pāto paceyya ce bhuñje, icce+ttha pacanakriyā;
anya-e0807n5:161_0: Sattiyaṁ arahate ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:161_1: Bhavaṁ khalu pattaṁ paceyya, bhavaṁ satto, bhavaṁ araho.
anya-e0807n5:163_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā.
anya-e0807n5:163_1: Api bhavaṁ gilitaṁ pāsāṇaṁ paceyya udaragginā, sambhāvemi saddahāmi bhavaṁ paceyya, bhavaṁ pacissati, bhavaṁ apaci.
anya-e0807n5:167_0: Patthanā, bhattiyā vā+tha, na vā byāpāraṇā vidhi.
anya-e0807n5:168_0: Pañhe-kiṁ so bhattaṁ paceyya, udāhu byañjanaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:169_0: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṁ antaṁ ssu vho e āmase
anya-e0807n5:170_1: Āsiṁsanatthe-so sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0807n5:172_0: Ato parassa hissa vā lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:172_1: Tvaṁ sukhī bhava bhavāhi, himhi dīgho.
anya-e0807n5:172_3: Ahaṁ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṁ sukhino bhavāma.
anya-e0807n5:172_4: Paracchakke-tathā bhavataṁ, bhavantaṁ. Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave bhavāmase.
anya-e0807n5:172_5: Kamme-tayā anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu iccādi. Bhāve-bhūyatu, bhūyataṁ.
anya-e0807n5:173_0: Āṇattiyaṁ-devadatto dāni odanaṁ pacatu, pacantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:173_4: Ghammādese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi. Kamme-gacchīyatu iccādi. Tathā gamīyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:174_0: Vidhimhi-lassa lope lutte vuddhi, idha pabbato hotu.
anya-e0807n5:175_0: Nimantane-adhivāsetha tumhe bhante bhagavā bhojanaṁ, vasatissa ‘‘curādito ṇī’’ti ṇimhi ‘‘assā ṇānubandhe’’ti ā, ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye’’ti e ca hoti.
anya-e0807n5:175_1: Idha nissīdatu bhavaṁ, sadassa ‘‘jara+sadāna+mīma vā’’ti īma, manubandhattā antasarato īma.
anya-e0807n5:176_0: Ajjhesane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ, ettha curādittā purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:177_0: Anumatiyaṁ-puccha vāsava maṁ pañhaṁ, pavisatu bhavaṁ. Ettha pucchato hissa lopo. Evaṁ nisīda.
anya-e0807n5:178_0: Patthanā=yācanā, tatra-dada=dāne, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, dāto lassa ekāre ca ekaṁ me nayanaṁ dehi.
anya-e0807n5:179_0: Pattakāle-sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ. Ettha ‘‘tanāditvo’’ti o.
anya-e0807n5:183_1: So saggaṁ gacchati gameti, gacchanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:183_7: Tathā niyacchissati, saññamissati. Niyacchi, saṁyami. Niyacchissa, saṁyamissa. Niyaccheyya, saṁyameyya. Niyacchatu, saññamatu.
anya-e0807n5:183_8: Isa+siṁsa=icchāyaṁ, so saggaṁ icchati, icchanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:183_11: Pubbarūpe issati issate iccādi. Icchissati esissati iccādi. Icchi esi. Icchissa esissa. Iccheyya eseyya. Icchatu esatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:183_13: ‘‘Byañjane dīgharassā’’ti rasso, upapubbo, tathā upāsati. Acchissati upāsissati. Acchi upāsi. Acchissa upāsissa. Accheyya upāseyya. Acchatu upāsatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:183_14: Disa=pekkhane, dicchati dicchanti iccādi sabbaṁ purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:183_15: Labha=lābhe, ito paraṁ visesaṭṭhānamevavakkhāma, sabbavāro vuttānusārena gahetabbo. Labhati, labhanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:185_0: Labhasmā iṁ īnaṁ thaṁ+thā vā honti.
anya-e0807n5:185_1: So alabhittha labhittha alabhi labhi iṁ paccaye alatthaṁ alabhiṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:187_2: Kriyātipattiyaṁ ssābhāgassa cchaṅādese alacchā alabhissa iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:187_4: Kamme-bahulādhikārā ‘‘assū’’ti ukāro , pubbarūpe vussati vussissati iccādi. Tathā avacchā avasissā.
anya-e0807n5:187_5: Chida=dvedhākaraṇe, checchati chindissati, ‘‘mañca rudhādīnaṁ’’ti maṁ lo ca. Lassa lopo ca.
anya-e0807n5:187_7: Ruda=rodane, rucchati rodissati. Arucchā arodissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:188_0: Aññapaccayepi chidassa ‘‘cchaṅa’’ iti yogavibhāgā cchaṅa, bhūte ūṁ paccaye acchecchuṁ acchindiṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:188_2: Aññapaccayepi vaca=byattavacane iccādi, kamme-bahulādhikārā tyādīsu parabhūtesupi yathāgamaṁ vacādīnañcassa ‘‘vacādīnaṁ vassuṭa vā’’ti kamme uṭa ca ‘‘assū’’ti assa u ca, tena dhammo uccati vuccati, vuccanti iccādi, yassa ca pubbarūpaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:192_1: Makārānubandhattā ‘‘mānubandho sarāna+mantā paro’’ti paribhāsato sarā paro. Avoci, avocuṁ, avoco iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:192_3: Kriyātipattiyaṁ-avakkhā avacissā, avakkhiṁsu avacissiṁsu iccādi. Vaceyya iccādi. Kamme-vucceyya iccādi. Tathā vacatu, vuccatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:194_0: Kusa=akkose, āpubbo, tassa rasso ca, akkosati iccādi ñeyyaṁ, lavikaraṇalopavuddhiyo.
anya-e0807n5:196_0: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:197_1: Kamme-kye ‘‘hassa vipallāso’’ti vipariyāso, tena so vuyhati, ‘‘assū’’ti uttaṁ. Vahissati, vuyhissati. Avahi, avuyhittha, avuhi. Avahissā, vuyhīssā iccādi. Vaheyya, vuyheyya. Vahatu, vuyhatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:200_0: Jara marānaṁ īyaṅa vā hoti māna+nta+tyādīsu. Jīyati.
anya-e0807n5:200_1: ‘‘Jara sadāna+mīma’’ti īmaāgamo lo ca, jīrati. Kamme-jīrīyati jīyīyati.
anya-e0807n5:200_2: Evaṁ jīyissati jīrissati, jīyīyissati jīrīyissati. Ajīyi ajīri, ajīyīyi ajīrīyi.
anya-e0807n5:200_3: Ajīyissā ajīrissā, ajīyīyissā ajīrīyissā ajīyissā ajīrīyissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:200_4: Mara=pāṇacāge, īyaṅa, mīyati marati, mīyanti maranti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:202_0: 5,124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhāti
anya-e0807n5:203_0: Ete ādesā disassa vā honti. Anekavaṇṇattā sabbādeso.
anya-e0807n5:203_2: Kamme-kye pubbarūpo, dissati dissanti, vipassīyati dakkhīyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:205_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati.
anya-e0807n5:205_1: Apassi passi, apassiṁsu passiṁsu apasso passo, apassittha passittha.
anya-e0807n5:205_3: Tathā adassī dassī, adassiṁsu dassiṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:205_4: Anajjatane dasādeso, addasā addasa. Addā adda iccādi. Apassissa dakkhissa iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:206_0: Sada=visaraṇagatyāvasādanādānesu, nipubbo, ‘‘jarasadāna+mīma vā’’ti īmaāgamo. Nisīdati, nisīdanti iccādi. Bhāve-nisajjati, nisajjate.
anya-e0807n5:209_0: Yajassa yassa ṭi+yī honti kānubandheti bahulādhikārā tyādivisayepi kye pubbarūpe ca ijjati yijjati mayā buddho.
anya-e0807n5:209_1: So yajissati, tena ijjissate yijjissate. So yajī , tena ijji yijji.
anya-e0807n5:209_4: So yajatu, tena ijjatu yijjatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:210_0: Vada=vacane, ‘‘gamavadā’’ dinā vadassa vajjādeso vā, lassa ‘‘ūlasse’’ti kvaci e ca, vajjati vadeti vadati, vajjenti vadenti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:210_1: Kamme – ‘‘kyassā’’ti īña, vajjīyati vajjati vadīyati, vajjīyanti vajjanti vadīyanti. Vadissati, vadissanti. Avadī vadī, avadiṁsu vadiṁsu. Avadissa vadissa.
anya-e0807n5:210_2: Vajje vajjeyya vade vadeyya, vajjeyyuṁ vadeyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:210_3: Vajjetu vadetu vadatu iccādi yathāgamaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:211_0: Kamu=padavikkhepe, ‘‘parokkhāyañcā’’ti caggahaṇena kama kama iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope lavikaraṇe ‘‘kavaggahā’’ dinā kassa ce niggahītāgame ca kate caṁkamati kamati iccādi. Cala=kampane, caṁcalati.
anya-e0807n5:212_0: Hū+bhū=sattāyaṁ, tyādīsu ‘‘kattari lo’’ti lo, tassa lope ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye’’ti okāro. So hoti, te honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa iccādi. Bhāve-tena hūyati hūyate.
anya-e0807n5:214_0: Hūssa heādayo honti ssaccādo. Hessati hehi ssati hohissati.
anya-e0807n5:216_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa vā lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n5:216_3: Anajjatane īmhi añāgamo, ‘‘paro kvacī’’ti īssa lopo, so ahu.
anya-e0807n5:216_4: Vuddhimhi ‘‘dīghā īssa’’ iti īssa siādeso, suvo ahosi ānando.
anya-e0807n5:218_0: Hūto parassa u+miccassa resuṁ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:218_1: Rakārānubandho ‘‘rānubandhentasarādissā’’ti antasarādissa lopo. Ahesuṁ. Okāravuddhi avādese ahavuṁ. Ossa siādese ahosi.
anya-e0807n5:220_3: Parassaralope rasse ca ahuṁ, ahosimha, ahumha, rasso.
anya-e0807n5:220_5: Anajjatane āūādipaccaye kate ‘‘yuvaṇṇāna+miya ṅuvaṅa sare’’ti uvaṅādese ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvo, ahuvattha.
anya-e0807n5:220_6: Assa amādese ahuṁ ahuvaṁ, ahumha iccādi. Bhāve-tena ahuyi ahuyittha. Ahavissā, ahavissaṁsu iccādi. Bhāve-ahuyissa, ahuyissatha.
anya-e0807n5:220_7: Pubbassaralopo, heyya , heyyuṁ iccādi. Bhāve-hūyeyya, hūyetha. Hotu, hontu iccādi. Bhāve-hūyatu, hūyataṁ.
anya-e0807n5:220_8: Anupubbe anubhoti iccādi sabbavāresu yojetabbaṁ. Bhāve rūpābhāvā.
anya-e0807n5:221_2: Kamme-atipubbo, kye ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti issa dīghe ca kate tena atisīyati, atisīyanti iccādi. Bhāve-tena sīyati, sīyate. Tathā bhavissatiādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:222_0: Nī=pāpane, dvikammako+yaṁ, ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti nayati, nenti nayanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:222_1: Kamme-nīyate gāmaṁ ajo devadattena iccādi. Tathā sesesupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:225_1: Lassa lope tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti.
anya-e0807n5:227_0: Pādito parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho hoti vā. Saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti.
anya-e0807n5:229_0: Ñādito+ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Upaṭhīyati, upaṭhīyanti.
anya-e0807n5:229_1: Ṭhahādese ‘‘kyassā’’ti īña , tena patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti. Bhāve-īmhi ṭhīyati, ṭhīyate.
anya-e0807n5:229_3: Īssa simhi aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṁsu, saṇṭhahi, saṇṭhahiṁsu. Patiṭṭhissa patiṭṭhahissa.
anya-e0807n5:229_4: Tiṭṭhe tiṭṭheyya, saṇṭhe saṇṭheyya, saṇṭheyyuṁ, saṇṭhahe saṇṭhaheyya.
anya-e0807n5:230_1: ‘‘Tavaggavaraṇā’’ do ‘‘bayañā’’ti yogavibhāgena vassa bakāro, pibati. Kammepīyati, pīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:235_0: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu. Ṭo sabbādesattho. Tvaṁ asi.
anya-e0807n5:237_0: Asasmā paresaṁ mimānaṁ mhimhā vā honti taṁsanniyogena asassa aṭa ca. Amhi.
anya-e0807n5:239_0: Esu mimesu asassa so hoti, pararūpabādhanatthaṁ. Asmi, amha asma. Bhavissatipaccaye –
anya-e0807n5:241_0: Parokkhā a-ādo anajjatana ā-ādo kriyātipattissā-ādo bhavissatissatyādo ca atthissa bhu hoti.
anya-e0807n5:241_1: Ādesavidhānaṁ asassāpayogatthaṁ, kismiñci paccayavisese, tasmā asitabbantiādi na bhavati. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavā, abhavu.
anya-e0807n5:241_2: Kriyātipattiyaṁ bhuādese abhavissa, abhavissaṁsu iccādi. Eyyādimhi –
anya-e0807n5:243_0: Asa=bhuvi+ccasmā paresaṁ eyyādicchannaṁ sādayo honti yathākkamaṁ. Pararūpe so assa, te assu. Tvaṁ assa, tumhe assatha. Ahaṁ assaṁ, mayaṁ assāma.
anya-e0807n5:243_1: Tvādimhi so atu, assa lope santhu, ayādese tvaṁ ahi, tumhe attha. Amhi, amha, sādese asmi asma.
anya-e0807n5:243_2: Bahulādhikārā ajjatane āsi, āsiṁsu, āsuṁ iccādīpi honti.
anya-e0807n5:246_0: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti.
anya-e0807n5:248_0: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūti. Uvaṅādese brūvanti.
anya-e0807n5:250_0: Āhā paresaṁ ti+antīnaṁ ṭa+ṭū honti. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā.
anya-e0807n5:250_1: Atoyeva āhā paresaṁ tiantīnaṁ ṭaṭūvidhānañāpakā tiantīsu brūssa āho. Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma iccādi. Bravissati. Abravi abravī, abravuṁ. Anajjatane abravā, abravu. Parokkhāyaṁ –
anya-e0807n5:252_1: Supine kira so āha, te āhu iccādi. Abravissa. Brave braveyya.
anya-e0807n5:253_0: Hana=hiṁsāyaṁ, timhi vikaraṇalope so hanati hanti. Te hananti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:253_1: Kamme-ye nassa ññe pubbarūpaṁ, tena haññati, haññanti haññare. Tathā hanissati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:255_0: Hanā ssāssa cha+khā vā honti. Paṭihaṁkhāmi paṭihanissāmi. Haṁchema hanissāma.
anya-e0807n5:256_1: ‘‘Parokkhāyañcā’’ti caggahaṇena hu huti dvittaṁ, ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’’ti hassa jo, lalopo vuddhi ca, juhoti aggiṁ, aññatra ‘‘yavā sare’’ti vakāro, juhvati. Juhonti. Juhvanti.
anya-e0807n5:256_3: Kamme – ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti dīghe hūyati tena aggi iccādi. Juhissati, juhissanti.
anya-e0807n5:256_4: Ajuhavi ajuhosi, ajuhavuṁ ajuhaviṁsu ajuhavaṁsu ajuhosuṁ. Ajuhissa, ajuhissaṁssu. Juhe juheyya. Juhotu, juhontu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:257_0: Hā=cāge, pure viya dvebhāvachādesalope ‘‘rasso pubbassā’’ti pubbassa āssa rasso. Jahāti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:257_1: Kamme – ‘‘aññādissā+ssī kye’’ti kye āssa ī, hīyati iccādi. Jahissati.
anya-e0807n5:257_2: Ajahāsi, ‘‘dīghā īssa’’ iti si, pajahi, ajahiṁsu ajahaṁsu, pajahiṁsu pajahuṁ. Kamme-pahīyi pahīyittha. Ssādi+eyyādi+tvādīsupi ñeyyā.
anya-e0807n5:258_0: Dā=dāne, dvibhāvarassattāni, lalopo, dadāti, dadanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:258_1: ‘‘Gamavadā’’ dinā dajjādese dajjati, dajjanti iccādi. Lasse+kāre dānaṁ deti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:260_0: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṁ hoti vā mimesu.
anya-e0807n5:260_1: Vaggantaṁ, dammi demi, damma dema. Īkāre dīyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:260_2: Anāgatatthe iñāgame saraṇopādi, dadissati, dadissanti. Dajjissati, dajjissanti. Lavikaraṇe dassati, dassanti.
anya-e0807n5:260_3: Ajjatane-adadi, adadiṁsu, adajji, adajjiṁsu, adāsi, adaṁsu. Anajjatane-adadā, adadu.
anya-e0807n5:260_6: ‘‘Ṭā’’ti bahulādhikārā dajjādesā parassa eyyassa ṭā, dajjā, dajjuṁ dajjeyyaṁ dadeyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:260_7: Tvādīsu-dadātu, dadantu, dajjatu, dajjantu, lasse+kāre detu, dentu iccādi. Sabbattha kammepi yojanīyaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:261_0: Dhā=dhāraṇe, tyādimhi caggahaṇena dvitte pubbākārassa rassatte lalope ‘‘catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti pubbadhakārassa dakāre ca kate dadhāti, dadhanti.
anya-e0807n5:261_1: Pipubbo, ‘‘tadaminā’’ dinā āssa lopo, ‘‘dhāssa ho’’ti dvitte parassa dhāssa hakāro, dvāraṁ pidahati, pidahanti. Lasse+kāre nidheti, nidhenti.
anya-e0807n5:261_3: Dhassati, pidahissati, paridahessati. Adhāsi, pidahi. Adhassa, pidahissa.
anya-e0807n5:262_0: Bhūvādi ca juhādi ca, huvādidhātavo ci+me;
anya-e0807n5:265_0: Adhunā vikaraṇapabhedapakāsanatthaṁ rudhādīnaṁ aṭṭhagaṇānaṁ kānici rūpāni udāhariyante –
anya-e0807n5:268_0: Rudhādiko aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna+nta+tyādīsu lo hoti mañca+ntasarā paro.
anya-e0807n5:268_3: Kamme-nipubbo kyo dhassa cavagga+pubbarūpa+tatiyakkharajakārā, tena maggo nirujjhati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:268_7: Rundhe rundheyya, nirujjhe nirujjheyya. Rundhatu, rundhantu. Tvaṁ rundha rundhāhi.
anya-e0807n5:269_1: Bhavissatipaccaye – ‘‘labha vasacchidā’’ dinā cchaṅādese checchati chindissati.
anya-e0807n5:269_3: Achindi chindi, acchejji, acchejjiṁsu. Acchindissā achijjissā.
anya-e0807n5:269_4: Chinde chindeyya, chijje chijjeyya, chindatu, chindantu, chijjatu, chijjantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:270_1: Bhavissatimhi ‘‘bhuja+muca+vaca+visānaṁ kkhaṅa’’ti dhātvantena saha ssassa kkhaṅādese vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhuñjissati, bhokkhanti, bhuñjissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:272_0: Diva=kīḷā vijigiṁsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu,
anya-e0807n5:274_2: Vassa bakāre pubbarūpaṁ, so jutaṁ dibbati, dibbanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:274_3: Kamme-kye tena dibbati, dibbanti iccādi. Dibbissati, tena dibbissati. Adibbi dibbi. Tena adibbi dibbi. Adibbissa. Tena adibbissa. Dibbe dibbeyya. Tena dibbe dibbeyya. Dibbatu. Tena dibbatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:275_1: Pada=gamane, upubbo, cavaggapubbarūpāni, uppajjati, uppajjare uppajjanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:275_2: Kammekye tena paṭipajjate iccādi. Bhāve-uppajjate tayā.
anya-e0807n5:276_0: Jana=janane , ‘‘janissā’’ti ā hoti kānubandhe bahulādhikārā, so jāyati, jāyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:276_1: Kamme-janituṁ payojetīti ‘‘payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ce’’ti ṇimhi ‘‘aññatrāpī’’ti vuddhipaṭisedhe kyamhi ‘‘dīgho sarassā’’ti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati, janīyanti iccādi. So jāyissati. Tena janissati. So ajāyi, tena ajanīyi. So ajāyissa, tena ajanīyissa.
anya-e0807n5:279_0: Tudādīhi kattari lavisaye ko hoti. Tudati, tudanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:279_1: Kamme-tudyati tujjati, tudyare tudyanti, tujjare tujjanti+ccādi. Tathā tudissati tujjissati. Atudi, atudiṁsu, atujji.
anya-e0807n5:280_0: Visa=pavesane, papubbo. So gāmaṁ pavisati iccādi. Kamme-pavisīyati iccādi. Pavisissati. Pavisīyissati.
anya-e0807n5:280_2: Pāvisi, pavisi pāvekkhi, pathaviṁ pāvisiṁsu pavisiṁsu. Pāvisīyi. Pāvisissa pavisissa. Pāvisīyissa.
anya-e0807n5:280_3: Pavise paviseyya, vikaraṇalopo pavisīyeyya. Pavisatu, pavisīyatu iccādi. Nudati.
anya-e0807n5:283_0: Jyādīhi kattari lavisaye knā hoti. Na vuddhi. Kilese jināti, jinanti.
anya-e0807n5:283_1: Tena kileso jīyati, jīyanti, kye dīgho. Jinissati, jinissanti. Ajini jini. Ajīyi, ajīyittha. Ajinissa. Ajīyissa. Jineyya. Jinātu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:288_0: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, vijānāti iccādi. Kamme-viññāyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:288_1: Kye ‘‘āsse cā’’ti ettha ‘‘āsse’’ti yogavibhāgā āssa e hoti, yassa dvitte ñeyyati, ñeyyanti iccādi. Vijānissati, vijānissanti.
anya-e0807n5:288_2: Kamme – ‘‘kyassa sse’’ti kyalope rasse ca kate ñāssati, ñāssanti, viññāyissati, paññāyissati.
anya-e0807n5:290_0: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti.
anya-e0807n5:290_1: Añāgame samajāni, saṁjāni, saṁjāniṁsu. Samajā- niṁsu . Kamme-paññāyi, paññāyiṁsu. Ajānissa. Kamme-aññāyissa.
anya-e0807n5:292_0: Ñāto parassa eyyassa iyā+ñā honti vā. Jāniyā.
anya-e0807n5:294_0: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṁ vā hoti. Jaññā, jāneyya, jāneyyuṁ.
anya-e0807n5:294_1: Kamme-paññāyeyya, paññāyeyyuṁ. Vijānātu, vijānanthu. Kamme-viññāyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:295_0: Mā=māne, ‘‘ā ī ssādīnaṁ byañjanassiña’’ iti iñaiti yogavibhāgā iñāgame pubbasaralopo, mināti, minanti. Kamme-mīyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:295_1: Lū=chedane, ‘‘kṇāknāsu rasso’’ti dhātussa rasso, lunāti, lunanti. Kamme-lūyati iccādi. Dhu=kampane, dhunāti iccādi. (Jyādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:298_1: ‘‘Kṇāknāsu rasso’’ti rasse kiṇāti, kiṇanti iccādi. Kamme-vikkīyati, vikkīyanti. Vikkiṇissati, vikkiṇissanti. Vikkīyissati, vikkīyissanti. Akiṇi, vikkiṇi, vikkīyi. Akiṇissa, vikkiṇissa. Vikkiṇe vikkiṇeyya.
anya-e0807n5:302_0: Saka+āpānaṁ kuka+kuiccete āgamā honti ṇe. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Sakkunāti, sakkunanti.
anya-e0807n5:304_0: Sakasmā kṇāssa kkho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0807n5:306_0: Sakasmā kṇāssa kho vā hoti īādīsu. Asakkhi sakkhi, sakkhiṁsu. Asakkhissa, asakkhissaṁsu. Sakkuṇe sakkuṇeyya. Sakkuṇātu, sakkuṇantu.
anya-e0807n5:307_0: Apa=pāpuṇane, papubbo, ‘‘sakā+pānaṁ kuka+ku ṇe’’ti kukate sampatti pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti iccādi. Kammepāpīyati, pāpīyanti. Pāpuṇissati, pāpuṇissanti.
anya-e0807n5:307_1: Kamme-pāpīyissati, pāpīyissanti. Pāpuṇi, pāpuṇiṁsu. Kamme-pāpīyi, pāpīyittha. Apāpuṇissa. Kamme-apāpīyissa. Pāpuṇe, pāpuṇeyya. Kamme-pāpīyeyya. Pāpuṇātu, pāpuṇantu. Kamme-pāpīyatu iccādi. (Kyādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:310_0: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti. Kānubandhattā na vuddhi. Dhammaṁ suṇoti. Parassaralope suṇonti.
anya-e0807n5:310_3: Iñāgame suṇissati, suṇissanti. Kamme-kyalope vuddhi. Sossati, sossanti iccādi. Asuṇi suṇi, asuṇiṁsu suṇiṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:312_0: Tesu īādīsu suto paresaṁ kṇo+kṇānaṁ roṭa vā hoti. Rakāro anubandho. Ṭo sabbādesattho. Ussa lope dvittaṁ īssa si ca. Assosi, assosiṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:312_1: ‘‘Iṁssa ca siña’’ti yogavibhāgā siña, assosiṁsu, paccassosuṁ. Asuyi, asuyittha. Asuṇissa, tena asuyissa. Suṇe suṇeyya, suṇeyyaṁ. Tena sūye sūyeyya. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Sūyatu, sūyantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:313_0: Gi=sadde, giṇoti. Giṇanti. Tvaṁ giṇosi. Giṇissati, giṇissanti. Agiṇissa. Giṇeyya. Giṇotu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:313_1: Vu=saṁvaraṇe, āvuṇoti, āvuṇanti. Āvuṇosi iccādi. Sesesupi yojetabbaṁ. (Svādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:318_0: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakkavisaye. Tanute, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanvamhe. Kamme –
anya-e0807n5:320_0: Tanassa vā ā hoti kye. Papubbo, patāyati.
anya-e0807n5:320_2: Tathā vikaraṇalope iñāgame ca tanissati, tanissanti. Patāyissati. Atani, ataniṁsu. Atanissa. Patāyissa. Taneyya, taneyyuṁ. Tanotu, tanontu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:323_0: Karassa sa okārassa kubbādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Kubbati, kubbanti. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha.
anya-e0807n5:325_0: Karassa sa okārassa kuṁ vā hoti mimesu. Kummi karomi. Kumma karoma.
anya-e0807n5:325_1: Paracchakke kurute kubbate, kubbante iccādi. Kayirati, kayiranti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:325_2: Kamme-kyassa dvitte īssa rasso, kariyyati, karīyati vā iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:325_3: ‘‘Tavaggavaraṇā’’ dinā ye rassa yakāre kayyati, kayyanti.
anya-e0807n5:325_4: Bahulādhakārā kamme kvaci iminā kayirādese tena kayirati, kayiranti iccādi. Bhavissatimhi –
anya-e0807n5:327_0: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati, kāhanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:329_0: Karassa sa okārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu.
anya-e0807n5:331_0: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi. Īlope akā, akaṁsu. Ossa siādese akāsi. Siñāgame akāsittha. Akāsi, akāsiṁ, akāsimha.
anya-e0807n5:331_1: Aññatra akarikari, akariṁsu kariṁsu akaṁsu iccādi. Tena akarīyi iccādi. Akarissa iccādi. Kamme-akarīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:331_2: Eyyādimhi ‘‘kvaci vikaraṇānaṁ’’ti ovikaraṇalope karekareyya, kareyyuṁ iccādi. Kubbe kubbeyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:333_0: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0807n5:335_0: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṁ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṁ. Tvaṁ kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0807n5:337_0: Kayirā parasse+thassa ā hotītiādissa essa ā hoti. Kayirātha dhīro.
anya-e0807n5:337_2: Karotu kurutu vā, kubbantu karontu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:337_3: Paracchakke-kurutaṁ, kubbantaṁ. Kurussu karassu iccādi. ‘‘Eona+ma vaṇṇe’’ti akāro. Kuruvho, kubbe, kubbāmase. Kamme-karīyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:339_0: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti. Abhisaṅkharoti iccādi. Sabbattha yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:342_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti.
anya-e0807n5:342_2: Dhanaṁ corayati coreti iccādi. Kamme-corīyati iccādi. Corayissati coressati iccādi. Kamme-corīyissati iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:342_3: Acorayi corayi acoresi coresi iccādi. Acorayissa iccādi. Kamme-acorīyissa iccādi. Coraye corayeyya iccādi. Coretu corentu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:343_0: Cinta=cintāyaṁ, saṁyogattā na vuddhi, cinteti cintayati, cintenti.
anya-e0807n5:343_3: Pāla=rakkhaṇe, so dhammaṁ pāleti pālayati. Tena pālīyati+ccādi. (Curādinayo).
anya-e0807n5:344_0: Bhūvādi ca rudhādi ca, divādi ca tudādayo;
anya-e0807n5:345_0: Jyādī kiyādī svādī ca, tanādī ca curādayo.
anya-e0807n5:348_0: Khantiyaṁ tijā, vīmaṁsāyaṁ mānā ca kha+sapaccayā honti yathākkamaṁ. Tija=nisāne, akārassā+payogo.
anya-e0807n5:348_3: ‘‘Catutthadutiyā’’ dinā paṭhamakkharakakāre ca ‘‘khachasāna+mekassaro+di dve’’ti tikkha tikkha iti dvibhāve ‘‘lopo+nādibyañjanassā’’tiādito+ññassa byañjanassa lope ca kate titikkhādhātuto tyādipaccaya+lavikaraṇāni.
anya-e0807n5:349_0: Māna=pūjāyaṁ+timasmā sapaccaya, dvittādimhi kate ‘‘mānassa vī parassa ca maṁ’’ti pubbamānassa vī ca paramānassa mañca hoti.
anya-e0807n5:349_4: Payojakattā ṇi, ‘‘ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’’ti lavikaraṇaṁ, tejayati tejeti.
anya-e0807n5:349_5: Tathā curādittā na lavikaraṇaṁ, mānayati māneti.
anya-e0807n5:351_0: Tikicchāyaṁ saṁsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti.
anya-e0807n5:351_1: Kita=nivāse, chapaccaye pubbeva pararūpādimhi ca kate ‘‘kitassā+saṁsaye vā’’ti dvitte pubbassa tiādese tikicchadhātuto tyādayo.
anya-e0807n5:351_3: Vipubbato kitā chappaccayādimhi kate ‘‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’’ti dvitte pubbassa kassa co.
anya-e0807n5:353_0: Nindāyaṁ gupa+badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca.
anya-e0807n5:353_1: Gupa=rakkhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye ‘‘aññatrāpī’’ti ottābhāve ca pararūpādimhi ‘‘kavaggahā’’ dinā gassa je ca kate ‘‘gupissussā’’ti dvitte pubbassa ussa i hoti.
anya-e0807n5:353_3: Nindāyaṁ-badha=bandhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye ca imināva bassa bhakāre ca pararūpe paṭhamakkhare bhacchabhacchaiti dvitte anādibyañjanassa lope ‘‘catutthadutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’’ti dvitte pubbassa bhassa bakāre ‘‘khachasesvassī’’ti ikāre dīghe ca kate bībhacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:355_0: Tumantato icchāya+matthe te kha+sa+chā honti bahulaṁ, tuṁpaccayassa lopo ca hoti, sutattā. Bhuja=pālana+jjhohāresu.
anya-e0807n5:355_1: Bhojanāyāti viggayha ‘‘tuṁ+tāye’’ccādinā tuṁpaccaye ‘‘lahussupantassā’’ti okāre pararūpe ca kate bhottu+micchatīti viggayha iminā khapaccaye tuṁpaccayassa iminā ca lope ‘‘nimittābhāve nemittikassāpi ca abhāvo’’ti ñāyā pararūpaokārānaṁ abhāve khassa pararūpa+khakārādimhi ca kate bhukkha bhukkha iti dvitte tatiyabakāro hoti, bubhukkhadhātuto tyādayo honti, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:356_0: Ji=jaye, jayanāya iti viggayha pure viya tumādimhi kate jetu+micchatīti viggayha sappaccaye jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope dvitte parassa jissa ‘‘jiharānaṁ giṁ’’ti giṁ.
anya-e0807n5:357_0: Ghasa=adane , ghasitu+micchati chappaccayādimhi pure viya kate ghassa ‘‘kavaggahā’’dinā jhe jhassa ‘‘catutthadutiyā’’ dinā jakāre ‘‘khachasesvassī’’ti ikāre ca kate jighacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n5:359_1: Putta+micchatīti īyapaccaye īyādivuttittā ‘‘ekatthatāyaṁ’’ti vibhattilopo. Puttīyati, puttīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:365_1: Pabbato ivā+carati sīlādiguṇayogatoti pabbatāyati yogī, pabbatāyadhātuto tyādayo.
anya-e0807n5:367_1: Bhusoti paṭhamantato abhuso bhuso bhavatīti bhusāyati, bhusāyanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:367_2: ‘‘Vicchābhikkhaññesu dve’’ti ābhikkhaññatthe dvitte apaṭapaṭā paṭapaṭā bhavatīti āye paṭapaṭāyati, paṭapaṭāyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:369_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṁ atthe āyo hoti. Saddaṁ karoti saddāyati.
anya-e0807n5:371_0: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṁ atthe asso hoti.
anya-e0807n5:371_1: Namo karotīti asmiṁ atthe assapaccaye tyādayo honti, tathāgataṁ namassati, namassanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:373_1: Hatthinā atikkamatīti ipaccaye lavikaraṇa+ekāra+ayādesesu katesu atihatthayati.
anya-e0807n5:373_2: Evaṁ vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇāyati, vinayaṁ daḷhaṁ karoti daḷhayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhāyati, kusalaṁ pucchati kusalāyati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:375_2: Saccāpayati, saccāpeti iccādi. Attha+mācikkhati atthāpayati. Evaṁ vedāpayati.
anya-e0807n5:377_0: Kattāraṁ yo payojeti, tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi+ṇāpī honti bahulaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:379_0: Dve dve+ko hoti vā sese, bahulaṁtyanuvuttiyā.
anya-e0807n5:382_0: Tasmā kattari kamme ca, ṇi+ṇāpīnaṁ tu sambhavo;
anya-e0807n5:383_0: Na bhāve suddhakattā tu, kammaṁ hoti payojake.
anya-e0807n5:386_0: Bhavituṁ payojayatīti atthe iminā ṇippaccayo. Ṇakāro ṇānubandhakāriyattho.
anya-e0807n5:386_2: Tyādimhi ‘‘ṇi+ṇāpyā+pīhi vā’’ti lavikaraṇe ekāre ‘‘eona+mayavā sare’’ti ayādeso.
anya-e0807n5:386_3: So samādhiṁ bhāvayati bhāveti , bhāvayanti bhāventi+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:386_7: Ajjatane īssa simhi abhāvesi bhāvesi, abhāvayi bhāvayi, abhāvayiṁsu bhāvayiṁsu.
anya-e0807n5:386_8: Parassaralope abhāvesuṁ bhāvesuṁ, abhāvayaṁsu bhāvayaṁsu, abhāvayuṁ bhāvayuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:386_10: Abhāvissa abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṁsu abhāvayissaṁsu. Kamme-abhāvayissaṁ iccādi. Bhāve bhāveyya iccādi. Kamme-bhāvīyeyya iccādi. Bhāvayatu bhāvetu iccādi. Kamme-bhāvīyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:387_1: So devadattena odanaṁ pācayati pāceti iccādi, tathā pācāpayati pācāpeti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:387_2: Kamme-so tena devadattena odano pācīyati pācāpīyati+ccādi, bhavissatyādīsupi yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n5:388_0: Gantuṁ payojetīti atthe so taṁ purisaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati gameti gacchāpayati gacchāpeti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:389_0: Guha=saṁvaraṇe, guhituṁ payojetīti ṇimhi ‘‘guhissa sare’’ti dīgho. Gūhayati, gūhayanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:390_0: Disa+dusa=appītiyaṁ, dusituṁ payojetīti ṇimhi ‘‘ṇimhi dīgho dusassā’’ti dīghe dūsayati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n5:391_0: Tathā icchantaṁ payojayati icchāpayati icchāpeti, esayati eseti.
anya-e0807n5:391_3: Lābhayati lābheti, evaṁ vāsayati vāseti, vāsāpayati vāsāpeti.
anya-e0807n5:391_6: Hū=sattāyaṁ, pahontaṁ payojayati pahāvayati pahāveti iccādi. Sāyayati sāyāpayati sāyāpeti. Nāyāpayati nāyāpeti. Patiṭṭhāpayati patiṭṭhāpeti. Rasse patiṭṭhapeti.
anya-e0807n5:391_7: Hantuṁ payojayatīti ṇi+ṇāpī, ‘‘hanassa ghāto ṇānubandhe’’ti ghātādese ghātayati ghāteti.
anya-e0807n5:391_8: Tathā juhāvayati juhāveti, jahāpayati jahāpeti. Hāpayati hāpeti. Dāpayati dāpeti.
anya-e0807n5:392_0: Idāni rudhādiaṭṭhagaṇā dassīyante-rodhayati rodheti. Devayati deveti. Todayati todeti. Jayāpayati jayāpeti. Vikkayati vikkayāpeti. Sāvayati sāveti. Vitānayati vitāneti. Corāpayati corāpeti iccādi.
anya-e0807n5:395_0: Titikkhantaṁ payojayati titikkheti titikkhāpeti, tikicchayati tikiccheti tikicchāpayati tikicchāpeti.
anya-e0807n5:395_1: Evaṁ bubhukkheti bubhukkhāpeti. Pabbatāyayati. Puttīyayati iccādi. (Khādipaccayanayo).
